title: What does it take to be the best? What do all these people have in common?
body:
https://s2.stabroeknews.com/images/2017/01/20170119James-Harden.jpg

https://www.theepochtimes.com/assets/uploads/2015/06/11/BHarperAP860906768635.jpg

https://i1.wp.com/www.blogcdn.com/www.thebvx.com/media/2010/11/randymoss.jpg

http://img2.rnkr-static.com/list_img_v2/1271/341271/full/the-very-best-of-the-most-interesting-man-in-the-world-meme.jpg

Well, the data is clear. Being the best requires one very obvious and important quality.

An enviable and majestic beard.

It's clearly the most important quality to possess for an individual looking to be the best.

Which brings us to the main point:

https://i.gyazo.com/thumb/1200/_283ef44460d897e11ed8d87457ed1d9d-png.jpg

Granted, this photo is a bit older, but for those who watched the NA LCS today one thing immediately jumped out. And that was the truly majestic Bjeardsen. With TSM's captain taking his beard game to the next level I think it's safe to say that the team's chances of winning a World Championship have improved, at minimum, 500%.

I'm calling it now, Bjeardsen for the win.

Edit: Couldn't find a good photo of current Bjeardsen, but I did find a link to a youtube video that properly displays his new facial features in their full glory.
